subject: Movies
lead_paragraph: In this Anatomy of a Scene, the writer and director Olivier Assayas narrates a sequence from “Clouds of Sils Maria,” featuring Juliette Binoche and Kristen Stewart.
snippet: In this Anatomy of a Scene, the writer and director Olivier Assayas narrates a sequence from “Clouds of Sils Maria,” featuring Juliette Binoche and Kristen Stewart.
